source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_00<tab>Hervoix is awaiting his punishment for neglecting his duties.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_00<tab>チョコボの森のオ・ベン・ティアは、雑用を丸投げしたエルヴォワに呆れているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_01<tab>Before Hervoix gets his dose of punishment from O'bhen Tia, a cry rings out through the forest, seemingly coming from the northeast. O'bhen Tia, suspecting that it may be the outlaws, hurries off in the voice's direction, and Hervoix follows at his heels. Go after the rest of the group to find out who let out the distressed scream.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_01<tab>オ・ベン・ティアと話をしていたところ、何者かの悲鳴らしき声が聞こえた。チョコボの森で、悲鳴の主を探そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_02<tab>Northwest of Tailfeather, you find an upset Q'yantaa standing next to a wounded Hudde. It appears the veteran hunter took an arrow in his protégé's stead─an arrow loosed by none other than the exiled Bauricoin. O'bhen Tia will help Hudde return to Tailfeather to be treated. Make your own way back and speak with the others regarding this troubling turn of events.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_02<tab>悲鳴の主は、キ・ヤンターだった。テイルフェザーを追放されたボリコワンの襲撃に遭い、相方の熟練猟師ヒュードが大怪我を負っていた。高地ドラヴァニアのテイルフェザーに戻り、「オ・ベン・ティア」らと合流しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_03<tab>Upon returning to Tailfeather, you find your old acquaintance Gysol waiting, and he brings disturbing news: Bauricoin waylaid him on his way to Tailfeather, stealing his chocobo hatchling and promising revenge on Q'yantaa and Loupard. Q'yantaa, hot-headed as ever, hastens to Bauricoin's alleged location without considering the possibility of a trap. Both Hervoix and O'bhen Tia follow after her out of fear for her safety. Speak with Loupard to see what the best course of action could be.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_03<tab>オ・ベン・ティアらと合流した。ジゾルのヒナチョコボがボリコワンに奪われたことがわかり、新米ふたりとオ・ベン・ティアがボリコワンを捕えに向かってしまった。テイルフェザーに残った「ルーパル」に、対応を相談しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_04<tab>Loupard bids you also follow the group in case Bauricoin's trap proves to be overwhelming. Meet up with the hunters to the north of Tailfeather.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_04<tab>ルーパルに、オ・ベン・ティアたちを追いかけるよう頼まれた。テイルフェザーの北に向かった「オ・ベン・ティア」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_05<tab>Once you catch up to them, you find O'bhen Tia hunched over, apparently a victim of Bauricoin's trap. As you attempt to speak with the wounded O'bhen Tia, you are attacked by two outlaw hunters. Q'yantaa and Hervoix flee from the ambush in pursuit of Bauricoin. Defeat the hunters and save O'bhen Tia.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_05<tab>オ・ベン・ティアと合流したところ、待ち伏せしていた無法者が現れた。妨害を退け、「オ・ベン・ティア」を救助しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_06<tab>O'bhen Tia seems more concerned about the two novice hunters than his own wounds, and bids you follow them before they come to harm at Bauricoin's hands. Hurry to the northwest camp.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_06<tab>オ・ベン・ティアを救助したところ、ボリコワンを捕まえにいったキ・ヤンターとエルヴォワを追ってほしいと頼まれた。さらに北に向かったキ・ヤンターとエルヴォワを追い、「ボリコワン」の居場所を探しだそう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_07<tab>You arrive at the camp to find that Q'yantaa and Hervoix have somehow managed to subdue and restrain Bauricoin. Q'yantaa demands to know the whereabouts of Gysol's chocobo hatchling, and Bauricoin coldly explains that he cooked the poor bird, justifying his cruel misdeeds by stating that his actions are no different than any of the other hunters in Tailfeather. Q'yantaa hesitates, finally deciding to partake of the chocobo meat prepared by Bauricoin, stating that she is doing it out of respect for the hatchling's sacrifice. She further goes on to explain that the hunters of Tailfeather work to maintain the natural order, while outlaws like Bauricoin only threaten to destroy it. Hervoix seems to finally understand the significance of his chief's philosophy. Q'yantaa will return to Tailfeather to break the tragic news to Gysol, and Hervoix will take Bauricoin to Tailfeather in shackles. Return to Tailfeather and tell Loupard about what happened at the camp.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_07<tab>ボリコワンを発見した。新米のキ・ヤンターとエルヴォワは、見事ボリコワンを捕らえていたが、ヒナチョコボの救出はならなかった……。テイルフェザーの「ルーパル」に、顛末を報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_08<tab>You return to Tailfeather and rejoin Loupard, Hudde, and O'bhen Tia. Loupard is grateful for your help in getting through this ordeal, and assures you that Bauricoin will not be troubling chocobos any longer. The other hunters reflect upon the incident, and hope that their partners both take away the fact that hunting─and life─does not always have an ideal outcome. Optimistic that everyone will come out of this tragedy a stronger person in the end, Hudde and O'bhen Tia leave to continue their hunting. Loupard thanks you once again, excited about the future growth of the two hunting teams.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_08<tab>ルーパルに報告した。事件は、キレイ事ばかりでは終わらなかった。だが、ふたりの新米猟師には、チョコボたちへの感謝の気持ちがしっかりと根づいている……。先輩猟師たちはそのことを救いとして、それぞれの仕事に戻っていくのだった。

target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_SEQ_09<tab>

target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_TODO_00<tab>悲鳴の主を探す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_000<tab>To think that the chief actually cared so much about the forest... I've been such a fool...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_000先輩、そんなに真面目に森のことを考えてたなんて。
俺、マジ反省っす……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_000<tab>Godsdammit, Hervoix, ye can't even do yer own work!? What am I gonna do with─ Huh, what's that?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_000まったく、エルヴォワの野郎。
まさか自分でやらずにあんたに任せてたとは……。
……ん？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_001<tab>...Sounded like a scream! It came from the northeast...it better not be the bloody outlaws again!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_001……誰かの声が聞こえなかったか？
悲鳴のように聞こえたんだが……。
北東の方角だな、ちょっと行ってみるか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_002<tab>Ch-Chief! ...Adventurer, we have to follow him. With me!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_002ちょ、ちょっと先輩……！
冒険者さん、俺らも追いかけましょう！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HEUDE_000_005<tab>It's just...a flesh wound.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HEUDE_000_005……チッ。
俺としたことがな……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_006<tab>Hudde!? What the hells happened!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_006<tab>なっ、何があったんだよ、ヒュード！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_007<tab>Th-That's Hudde!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_007ヒュードさんって……熟練の猟師の方ですよね！？
それが、どうしてこんな……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it's you! Hudde's hurt! Please help him!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_010ぼ、冒険者さん！？
助けて、ヒュードさんが怪我を……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HEUDE_000_011<tab>I'll be fine, Q'yantaa. It's nothing...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HEUDE_000_011チッ……俺としたことがな。
ひよっこに、ダセェところ見られちまった……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HEUDE_000_012<tab>That bastard Bauricoin loosed an arrow at Q'yantaa. A heartbeat later, and she would've... Ugh...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HEUDE_000_012ボリコワンの野郎が、突然、ヤンターを矢で射ってきてな。
とっさに庇ったんだが、このザマだ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_012<tab>Hudde, I'll help ye get back to Tailfeather. That wound needs lookin' at.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_012ボリコワンだって！？
いや……それより、ひでぇ怪我だぞ！
とりあえず、テイルフェザーに戻ろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_015<tab>Looks like there might be some trouble ahead. Adventurer, come on, let's meet with the others at Tailfeather!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_015冒険者さんの力が、また必要になるかもしれません。
……テイルフェザーで待ってます。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_016<tab>I've heard all about the mess. Hudde's restin' at the moment, an' he should recover afore long, but it looks like we've got another problem on our hands.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_016……話は聞いた。
ヒュードはベッドで休ませたよ。
ったく、やっかいなことになっちまったな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_017<tab>I thought we'd seen the last of Bauricoin...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_017<tab>まさか、あのボリコワンが戻ってくるなんてね……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_018<tab>I've heard about Bauricoin's misdeeds. Why would he dare to show his face near Tailfeather again?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_018<tab>ボリコワン……嫌なやつだって噂は聞いてたっす！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_GYSOL_000_019<tab>Is...is Q'yantaa here? I...I need her help...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_GYSOL_000_019うう……うう……。
ヤンターさんに助けてもらわなきゃ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_020<tab>Loupard and Q'yantaa've been tellin' me about this Bauricoin. So he's the bastard what got exiled from Tailfeather a while back? Gods know why he's come back now.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_020ボリコワンか……。
このテイルフェザーを追い出されたクソ野郎だな？
さて、どうしたもんか……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_100_022<tab>I knew just lettin' him walk away was a bad decision. The blame is mine...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_100_022<tab>……ボリコワンのやつめ、追放処分ぐらいじゃ甘かったか！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_GYSOL_000_021<tab>Um... Q'yantaa?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_GYSOL_000_021<tab>うぅ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_022<tab>Oh, is that Gysol!? How've the stables been treating─ What's wrong? You look like a bandersnatch just ate your hatchling.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_022あれっ、ジゾルがなんでここにいるの？
普通に混ざってたから、気づかなかった！
久しぶり……って、なんだか元気なさそうだけど、どうしたの？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_GYSOL_000_023<tab>Well, that's not too far from the truth. I...I came to Tailfeather to show you how much my chocobo had grown...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_GYSOL_000_023うぅぅ、聞いてくださいよぉ！
ヤンターさんたちに、ヒナチョコボを見せようと思って、
久しぶりにテイルフェザーに来たんですけど……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_GYSOL_000_024<tab>But... Not far from here a man in all black accosted me. He took my chocobo, and said he'd... <sob> He said he'd roast it whole!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_GYSOL_000_024道中で、見知らぬ強面の男に会って……。
そしたらそいつ、「喰ったら旨そうだな」って言って、
僕のヒナチョコボを拐っていったんです！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_GYSOL_000_025<tab><sniffle> Before he left, he said he had a message for you, Q'yantaa, and Loupard... <sniffle> He said he'd be waiting at the northwest camp, and he'd get his...revenge... <sniffle>
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_GYSOL_000_025そいつは、去り際にこうも言ってました。
「ルーパルとヤンターに伝えろ。
　北西のキャンプでお前らを待つ、これは復讐だ」って……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_026<tab>...Bauricoin! It's him! I'll string him up myself! Gysol, we'll get your chocobo back!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_026……間違いなく、ボリコワンね。
テイルフェザーから追放されたことを、逆恨みしているんだわ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_027<tab>W-Wait! You're just walking into his trap! ...Curses! We have to help her!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_027ちょっ……待てよ！
ノコノコ行ったら、そいつの思う壺だっつーの！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_028<tab>Bleedin' idiots! They've got heart, but it's like to get 'em killed! Loupard, stay with Gysol─ I ain't lettin' no greenhorns die on my watch!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_028ばっかやろう！
新米だけで、勝手に行動しやがるんじゃねぇ！
くそっ……ルーパル、お前はジゾルを頼む！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_GYSOL_000_032<tab>My...my chocobo...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_GYSOL_000_032<tab>うぅ……僕のヒナチョコボ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_030<tab>Bloody hells! Looks like I got no choice but to leave this to O'bhen Tia. Just the three of them, though...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_030オ・ベン・ティアがついてるとはいえ、
あのヒュードが不覚を取った相手だ……！
あいつらだけで、本当に大丈夫なのか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_031<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, they're gonna need your help. Go after them and make sure they don't come to harm!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_031やっぱり不安だ。
冒険者さん、あいつらに加勢してやってくれ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_043<tab>Catch up with them afore they fall into Bauricoin's trap!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_043<tab>冒険者さん、あいつらに加勢してやってくれ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_041<tab>Bauricoin! Where the hells are you!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_041<tab>ボリコワンのやつ、また……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_042<tab>Ch-Chief! Can you move!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_042<tab>せ、先輩……先輩、大丈夫っすか！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_040<tab>We walked right into that bastard's trap... He was waitin' for us, an' his arrow got me right in the─
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_040あの野郎……
仲間を引き連れて、待ち伏せしてやがったぜ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_041<tab>Godsdammit, they're still here─Hervoix, Q'yantaa, leave here!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_041気をつけろ、まだいるぞ！
ヤンター、エルヴォワ、お前たちは先に進め！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_042<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, protect O'bhen Tia! We're going after Bauricoin!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_042<tab>……ボリコワン、絶対に捕まえてみせる！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BALOON_000_043<tab>Finish 'em off!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BALOON_000_043<tab>雑魚は後回しだ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BALOON_000_044<tab>Kill 'em dead!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BALOON_000_044<tab>熟練者から殺せ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_050<tab>Those two are too green to be dealin' with the likes o' Bauricoin... They should've gone back to Tailfeather!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_050こんなみっともねぇ姿を、後輩に晒すとは情けねぇ。
後輩は、先輩の背中を見て育つっていうのによ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_051<tab>Follow 'em and make sure they don't get 'emselves killed!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_051ヤンターとエルヴォワは、ボリコワンを捕まえにいった。
ふたりだけじゃ心配だ……様子を見にいってくれ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_075<tab>Make sure they don't get killed...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_075ヤンターとエルヴォワは、ボリコワンを捕まえにいった。
ふたりだけじゃ心配だ……様子を見に行ってくれ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_076<tab>We did it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We got the bastard!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_076<tab>やってやったぜ、この腐れ外道が……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_077<tab>Seeing as <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> ain't murderers, I say we hear what he has to say for himself.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_077<tab>…………話を聞こうか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_060<tab>Cut these godsdamned ropes! I won't be bested by a couple of meddling kids!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_060くっそ……てめぇらみてぇな、
新米のガキどもにやられるなんてな……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_061<tab>Where's Gysol's chocobo!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_061<tab>……で、あなた、ジゾルのヒナチョコボはどうしたの？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_062<tab>Haha! You mean that plump, meaty hatchling? I'm as good as my word: I roasted it up with a side of popotoes!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_062ヘッ！　あいつに言ったとおりにしてやったよ。
旨そうだったから、ちょうどついさっき揚げたところさ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_063<tab>You disapprove, do you? Well, you have no right!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_063ハハッ、泣けよ……喚けよ！
偽善者ども！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_064<tab>In case you've forgotten, you're <var 1A 02 /var>chocobo<var 1A 01 /var> hunters! Like me, you prey on the dumb birds!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_064何が「卵を獲るな、抱卵中のチョコボを殺すな」だ！
普段はチョコボを狩って、それで生活してるくせに！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_065<tab>To us, chocobos are nothing but a means to survive─don't even think to deny it!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_065俺もお前らも、やってることは一緒だろ！？
結局、チョコボを生活の糧だとしか考えてねえんだろ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_066<tab>Admit it! You didn't drive me out of Tailfeather because you cared about the birds! You just couldn't bear the thought of a hunter making more coin than you!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_066なぁ、偽善者ども！
俺を追い出したのは、チョコボが可哀想だからじゃなくて、
俺の実力に嫉妬しただけなんじゃねぇのか！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_067<tab>Gysol. Your hatchling won't have died in vain.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_067<tab>……いただきます。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_068<tab>Wh-What the hells are you─!? I was right─you're no better than me!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_BAURICOIN_000_068な、何で食ってんだよ……。
可哀想じゃねえのか！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_069<tab>That's where you're wrong, Bauricoin! To you, this chocobo is nothing but prey to be consumed. But hunters must be thankful towards their quarry, for it is only by their sacrifices that we are able to live.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_069……これが、敬意よ。
私たちは、命の犠牲の上で生きている。
動物を、植物を、生きるための糧として利用しているんだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_070<tab>Each and every one of these sacrifices demands respect. We hunt not for sport, much less to inflict pain on others.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_070だからこそ、すべての犠牲に感謝している。
遊ぶための狩りなんてしないよ。
いたずらに奪われる命なんて、あっちゃいけない！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_071<tab>That's what separates us from the likes of you. You kill without scruple, without respect, and without conscience. You're nothing but a blight on this delicate landscape, and threaten to destroy its balance.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_071でも、あなたは違う。
あなたは無駄な殺生をし、私たちが守る森の秩序を乱した。
偽善者以下の……ただの、クズね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_072<tab>The chief says to always respect the animals we hunt, because they provide us our livelihood. Do you not see this?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_072俺らはチョコボを狩ってるが、
同時に、俺らはチョコボに生かされてる。
……ここに来たからこそ、学んだことさ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_073<tab>Gysol... He needs to know what happened to his pet. I'll go and tell him.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_073さて……
私は、ジゾルのところに行って、
ことの顛末について報告してくるわ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_074<tab>And I'll take this scum back to camp.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HERVOIX_000_074<tab>俺は、この腐れ外道を連行するよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_075<tab>And that leaves one last thing. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, go tell Loupard what happened here while we finish with our duties.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_QYANTAA_000_075そう、わかった。
じゃあ冒険者さん、ルーパルへの報告はお願い！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_080<tab>Hervoix's got more pluck than I gave him credit for.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_080<tab>エルヴォワが迷惑をかけたな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HEUDE_000_085<tab>Thank you for helping Q'yantaa.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HEUDE_000_085<tab>ヤンターの助けになってくれて、ありがとうな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_090<tab>Well, looks like this sordid episode's behind us, thanks to the three of you.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_090<tab>ありがとう、君のお陰で大事にならずに済んだよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_091<tab>What's gonna happen to Bauricoin, you ask? Let's just say he probably won't be able to bend the bow no more.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_091ボリコワンのやつをどうしたかって？
あいつは、もう弓を引くことはできないだろうな。
まぁ、なんというか……「落とし前はつけた」ってやつだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_092<tab>Not that that's gonna bring Gysol's hatchlin' back. Why, I ain't never seen a man wither so fast as when he heard the news. But eventually he pulled himself together and returned home, more determined than ever to take care o' his other birds.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_092ジゾルは落ち込んでいたが、帰ったよ。
アイツを待ってるチョコボが、まだほかにいる。
いちいち落ち込んでられないはずだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HEUDE_000_093<tab>Good intent don't keep a man fed. Us hunters know this better than most.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HEUDE_000_093……キレイ事じゃ、腹は満たせねぇ。
俺たちは、誰よりもそれを知っている。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_094<tab>Aye, it's a truth best learnt sooner than later. So long as the two young'uns keep what happened today close to their hearts, they'll go on to make fine hunters.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_094まぁ、新人たちも、それをわかったようで嬉しいよ。
きっといい猟師になるだろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_095<tab>Well, it's about time we set off into the forest once more. Adventurer, ye have my thanks for lookin' after my fool of a partner. Let's hope he remembers everythin' he learned while he was with ye.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_OBHENTIA_000_095さてと……俺はそろそろ、この場からオサラバするぜ。
出来のわりぃ「相方」の面倒を、みねぇといけねぇんでな。
冒険者にはいろいろ世話かけちまったな、ありがとうよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HEUDE_000_096<tab>I've spent enough time nursing my wounds, and the hunt awaits me and Q'yantaa. Can't keep my eyes off her for too long─who knows what she'll get up to?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_HEUDE_000_096怪我も治ったし、俺も行くとしよう。
見守ってねえと不安でしょうがねえ奴を、
「相方」にしちまったからな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_097<tab>Well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, looks like those two huntin' duos got bright futures ahead of them, thanks to your help. You'll always be welcome in this camp!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ723_01927_LOUPARD_000_097冒険者さん、改めて礼を言わせてくれ。
本当に、ありがとう！
